price: Ntukagire ikindi ubangikanya na Allah, utazavaho uba ikivume cyatereranywe.
arabic: لَّا تَجۡعَلۡ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَٰهًا ءَاخَرَ فَتَقۡعُدَ مَذۡمُومٗا مَّخۡذُولٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: lā tajʿal maʿa al-lahi ilāhan ākhara fataqʿuda madhmūman makhdhūlan
